text.div:
V3 Value SetSecurityPolicy

Types of security policies that further specify the ActClassPolicy value set. Examples: encrypt prohibit redisclosure without consent directive

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a SecurityPolicy

name: v3.SecurityPolicy
title: V3 Value SetSecurityPolicy
description:
Types of security policies that further specify the ActClassPolicy value set.  Examples:
  encrypt prohibit redisclosure without consent directive
